channel.title: CVE Feed for wpovernight -- PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpovernight -- PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-3047|2024-05-02T16:51:50.588Z -- wpovernight -- pdf%20invoices%20%26%20packing%20slips%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.8.0 via the transform() function. This can allow unauthenticated attackers to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.
